programme.title: Giant Lobster Hunters
programme.desc: As the winter season enters its final few weeks, the price of lobsters rises above 100 dollars per kilo, and a bunch of new boats try to capitalise on the high price. Meanwhile the Triton is hunting for big reds near Low Rocky Point, but other boats aren't the only problem - octopus are out in force, preying on rock lobster

programme.title: Magnum, PI
programme.desc: A Russian pilot defects to the West and hires Thomas to kidnap his fiancee, an athlete visiting Hawaii to compete, from under the watchful eye of the KGB. Detective drama, starring Tom Selleck

programme.title: The Professionals
programme.desc: A ministerial secretary innocently leaks information regarding a secret peace talks meeting to her lover, leading to a shooting incident and placing the future of the summit in jeopardy. While her boyfriend's involvement remains in doubt, Cowley gets her to pass on false information in the hope it will prove his innocence or confirm his guilt. Drama, starring Gordon Jackson, Lewis Collins and Martin Shaw

programme.title: Minder
programme.desc: Arthur loses a fortune in cash when his wine supplier is mugged and the money he entrusted is stolen. To add insult to injury the dodgy entrepreneur becomes the prime suspect for the attack, leading him and Terry on a mission to prove his innocence. George Cole stars

programme.title: Giant Lobster Hunters
programme.desc: Despite his reputation for finding big-money hauls, skipper Peter finds pickings slim at the end of the winter season. Elsewhere, the Minnamurra is heading back to port as Clive plans to motor through the night to try and capitalise on the current high lobster price

programme.desc: Niles leaves nothing to chance as he plans the perfect evening to propose to Daphne, but his efforts to persuade Martin to get her meddling mother out of the way by taking her on an impromptu date lead to disaster. Comedy, guest starring Millicent Martin, with John Mahoney and David Hyde Pierce

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien head to Pembrokeshire to meet a cattle breeder whose barns include a pair of discarded horns, and a camper van fan with a vintage pedal car

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In north London, Helen and her Albanian boyfriend David kick off the contest with their Greek menu. Their food goes down well with Sara and her Aussie husband Thierry, which is more than can be said for David's views on women's roles within the home. On day two, Vicky and Geoff cook up an Italian menu, but their rock and pop idol dress code is a huge flop with one couple. The hosts face a grilling over food shortcuts, and Helen and Vicky go head to head in the battle of the cheesecakes. Finally, Sara and Thierry serve up the fashions and food of the 1980s. However, one guest makes a fashion faux pas about Sara's favourite frock

Nineteen year-old Annabelle is pregnant with her first child and determined to break the cycle of care after being removed from her parents at just five years-old

Ryan who is 28 and from Cheltenham, is looking for his Mr Right. As a sucker for a silver fox and a dad bod, can he find his dream guy to wake up to every morning?

Meanwhile, 26-year-old florist Charlotte meets 29-year-old data analyst Adam from Blackpool, and former dancer and extrovert Patrick goes on a date with laid-back graphic designer Seph

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E

Can Gordon get through to this stubborn owner and save the eatery from disaster?

programme.desc: Return of the documentary going behind the doors of the London museum. A young dinosaur researcher scans a giant tooth-filled jawbone belonging to a Gorgosaurus which may reveal the secret of its success 80 million years ago. Elsewhere, the museum's team of experts help a schoolgirl identify a stone she found in her playground, and fly expert Erica heads to the Knepp Estate in Sussex in search of new insect species

programme.title: 5 News Update
programme.desc: The latest reports

programme.title: 999: Critical Condition
programme.desc: Following a car crash, 26-year-old Tino is rushed into hospital suffering from a potentially life-threatening aortic tear. After falling backwards on an escalator, Frank impaled his head on a metal step and the threat of blood loss is a major concern, and a university student is rushed in to have a tumour removed

programme.title: Casualty 24/7: Every Second Counts
programme.desc: With the computer system down, the staff resort to a whiteboard to keep track of everyone. Patients include an elderly man due to fly to Cyprus in two days, a former miner with breathing difficulties, a youngster with a footballing injury and a case of suspected meningitis. Plus, volunteer Jane Allen struggles when tasked with stashing a stationery delivery in the quiet room

programme.title: A&E After Dark
programme.desc: Yorkshire Air Ambulance bring 68-year-old Eric into Resus having been involved in a motorbike collision with a deer, a young patient's ankle is facing the wrong way, and the team treat a man who has fallen down the stairs after a night out

programme.title: Criminals: Caught on Camera
programme.desc: CCTV footage captures two off-duty police officers tackling an armed gang raiding a jewellery store. Plus, a drug dealer is caught after bragging about his lifestyle online

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: Tony Robinson's History of Britain
programme.desc: The actor explores the lives of people from the Georgian era, including the stories of gin entrepreneur Elizabeth Bowman, who fell foul of the law when her enterprise was made illegal, and coach driver Jack Rann, who became a highwayman

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Chandler and Monica go to a fertility clinic for tests, but are embarrassed to encounter an old acquaintance. Ross helps Joey pretend to be intelligent to woo Charlie, even though he is attracted to her himself, and Rachel sneaks into a spa for a massage

programme.title: Never Teach Your Wife to Drive
programme.desc: Documentary following three women who are learning how to drive under instruction from their partners, with the drama and mayhem of the lessons putting added strain on their relationships. In Hertfordshire, Becky's tendency to put her foot down on the accelerator and severe lack of spatial awareness leaves Greg stressed out, while John begins by taking Yasmin out for endless spins around a car park in Wigan. In Guisborough, North Yorkshire, Matt's high levels of patience are tested as he teaches his hot-tempered wife Yaveli the rules of the road

programme.title: House Doctor
programme.desc: Ann Maurice and Alistair Appleton head for Milton Keynes, where they help a couple desperate to sell their home so they can move to France. Ann sets out to persuade them to tone down the riot of colours and do away with the mountains of clutter that make the house seem small and dark

programme.title: Milkshake! Monkey's Amazing Adventures
programme.desc: The cheeky monkey goes to the beach to find out how waves are formed and what fun can be had with them

programme.title: Pip and Posy
programme.desc: Zac is reluctant to act out a story, and he makes up a series of daft excuses

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: Daring Danny X takes his horse off the trail and ends up on a wild ride

programme.title: Snoopy and Charlie Brown: The Peanuts Movie (2015)
programme.desc: The long-suffering youngster hopes his lifelong run of bad luck will come to an end when he develops a crush on a new schoolfriend. His beloved dog has more important things to worry about, as he dreams of taking to the skies in his airborne kennel. Animated comedy, with the voices of Noah Schnapp and Bill Melendez

programme.title: Hotel for Dogs (2009)
programme.desc: An orphaned brother and sister face losing their beloved dog when they go into a foster home that does not allow pets. The kids find the ideal hiding place in an abandoned hotel, and set about transforming it into luxury canine accommodation for not just their beloved pet, but every stray in town. Family comedy, starring Emma Roberts, Jake T Austin, Don Cheadle and Lisa Kudrow

programme.title: The War With Grandpa (2021)
programme.desc: After an unfortunate first date with a self-checkout till at a grocery store, cantankerous widower Ed Marino faces pressure from his daughter Sally to accept he can no longer take care of himself. She tries to persuade him to move in with her architect husband Arthur and their three children. Comedy, starring Robert De Niro, Uma Thurman and Rob Riggle

programme.title: Star Trek: Nemesis (2002)
programme.desc: The crew of the Starship Enterprise is sent to form an alliance with old enemies the Romulans after the alien empire is taken over by a new leader - a clone of Captain Picard. Though claiming to want peace, Starfleet's finest soon realise he has more sinister plans in mind, involving a doomsday weapon that could destroy Earth. Sci-fi adventure, starring Patrick Stewart, Tom Hardy and Brent Spiner

programme.title: Bill & Ted's Bogus Journey (1991)
programme.desc: The would-be heavy metal superstars face the Grim Reaper as they try to reclaim their souls from Hell, return to the land of the living and stop their robot doppelgangers from changing history. Along the way, they must also master their instruments, so they can triumph at the Battle of the Bands. Comedy sequel, starring Keanu Reeves, Alex Winter, William Sadler, Joss Ackland and George Carlin

programme.title: 12 Strong (2018)
programme.desc: The story of the first Special Forces team deployed to Afghanistan after 9/11. Under the leadership of a new captain, the team must work with an Afghan warlord to take down the Taliban. War drama, based on Doug Stanton's non-fiction book Horse Soldiers, starring Chris Hemsworth, Michael Shannon and Michael Pena

programme.title: The Rhythm Section (2019)
programme.desc: After a tragic plane crash kills her family, Stephanie Patrick heads down a path of self-destruction When she discovers it wasn't an accident, Stephanie turns to a former CIA operative who can help her find the culprits. But her quest to uncover the truth soon turns into a full-blown quest for revenge as Patrick decides to punish those responsible. Drama from 007 producers Barbara Broccoli and Michael Wilson, starring Blake Lively, Jude Law and Matilda Ziegler

programme.title: The Alleys (2022)
programme.desc: In the alleys of East Amman, a blackmailing voyeur sets off a series of unintended events, causing the lives of residents to collide and spiral into chaos. Drama, starring Emad Azmi and Baraka Rahmani

programme.title: Young Winston (1972)
programme.desc: Biopic of Winston Churchill, following the future prime minister's formative years. While working as a journalist, he travels to Africa to report on the Boer Wars, an assignment that leads to his incarceration in a prison camp. He escapes from captivity and returns to England to begin a political career. Directed by Richard Attenborough and starring Simon Ward, Anthony Hopkins, Anne Bancroft and Robert Shaw

programme.title: Yangtse Incident (1957)
programme.desc: A British frigate is heavily shelled and captured by Chinese communists on the Yangtse River in 1949. After a failed rescue mission by a sister ship, the remaining crew members put into action a daring escape plan that involves disguising the vessel and slipping her moorings under the cover of darkness. Fact-based action adventure, starring Richard Todd, William Hartnell and Akim Tamiroff

programme.title: Tucker: The Man and His Dream (1988)
programme.desc: The story of inventor Preston Tucker, who pioneered a range of futuristic automobiles in the post-war years, only to have his dreams hampered by corporate self-interest before the cars even rolled out of the garage. Drama, starring Jeff Bridges, Joan Allen and Christian Slater

programme.title: Master and Commander: The Far Side of the World (2003)
programme.desc: The captain of a British warship engages in a tense battle of wits and an escalating test of nerves with a French counterpart during the Napoleonic conflict, a pursuit that takes his crew on a dangerous journey along the coast of South America. Seafaring drama, adapted from Patrick O'Brian's novels, starring Russell Crowe, Paul Bettany, James D'Arcy, Billy Boyd and Edward Woodall

programme.title: Under Siege (1992)
programme.desc: Terrorists infiltrate a US battleship in a carefully orchestrated move to steal its arsenal of nuclear weapons, unaware the ship's resourceful cook - a veteran US Navy Seal - and a scantily clad stripper are about to foil their plans. Action adventure, starring Steven Seagal, Erika Eleniak, Gary Busey and Tommy Lee Jones

programme.title: Black Book (2006)
programme.desc: A Jewish woman joins the Dutch resistance after her family is murdered by the Nazis while trying to escape the country. Working as a singer, she seduces a Gestapo officer and uses their affair as a way of infiltrating Nazi high command, but finds herself caught up in a dangerous double life as she begins to fall in love with him. Second World War thriller, with Carice van Houten, Sebastian Koch, Thom Hoffman and Halina Reijn. In Dutch, German, English and Hebrew

programme.title: February (2015)
programme.desc: Two Catholic schoolgirls must battle a mysterious evil force when they get left behind over winter break at their boarding school, which is rumoured to be the home of a Satanic cult. Elsewhere, a patient in a mental hospital escapes, determined to make it to the school at all costs. Horror, starring Emma Roberts, Kiernan Shipka and Lucy Boynton

programme.title: The Far Country (1954)
programme.desc: A cowpoke is steering his cattle north to the Canadian border when a corrupt sheriff commandeers the herd. A local saloon-bar owner falls for the hapless cowboy, and with her help he recaptures his cattle. Hooking up with a wagon train, the couple head for the mining town of Dawson, but the thwarted and embittered sheriff is on their tail. Western, with James Stewart, Walter Brennan and Ruth Roman

programme.title: 23 Paces to Baker Street (1956)
programme.desc: A blind playwright overhears a conversation in a London pub concerning a kidnapped child. He goes straight to the police, but they dismiss his story as the product of an overactive imagination, forcing him to take matters into his own hands. With the help of his fiancee and secretary, he sets out to rescue the child and catch the crooks - but his only clue is the scent of a distinctive perfume. Thriller, with Van Johnson, Cecil Parker, Patricia Laffan and Vera Miles

programme.title: Sands of Iwo Jima (1949)
programme.desc: A tough, embittered US marine sergeant sets out to mould a group of raw recruits into men fit for action against the Japanese in the Pacific during the Second World War. Although his training methods are often brutal, his controversial approach looks set to pay dividends when they finally see real combat. Adventure, starring John Wayne, John Agar, Adele Mara and Forrest Tucker

programme.title: Cowboy (1958)
programme.desc: A Chicago hotel clerk befriends a visiting cowboy and soon talks his way into joining him on a cattle drive so he can impress the woman he loves. The tenderfoot has no idea of what awaits him as he ventures out into the Wild West, an experience that forces him to undergo a dramatic change. Western, starring Jack Lemmon, Glenn Ford, Anna Kashfi and Brian Donlevy

programme.title: Failure to Launch (2006)
programme.desc: A thirtysomething man has no intention of leaving the family home, so his exasperated parents respond by hiring a woman who earns her living enticing stay-at-home men to fall in love with her and then encouraging them to fly the nest. Romantic comedy, starring Sarah Jessica Parker, Matthew McConaughey, Kathy Bates and Zooey Deschanel

programme.title: Hunter Killer (2018)
programme.desc: Unconventional submarine skipper Joe Glass is sent to investigate the torpedoing of US and Russian vessels. He winds up trying to rescue the Russian president, who has been kidnapped by a rogue general. Action thriller, starring Gerard Butler, Gary Oldman and Common

programme.title: Heat and Dust (1982)
programme.desc: British researcher Anne is fascinated by the secrecy surrounding her infamous great aunt Olivia, and heads to India to uncover the truth. She learns that in the 1920s, Olivia had a scandalous affair with a local nobleman, and finds herself re-examining her own life as she retraces her relative's footsteps. Drama, starring Julie Christie, Greta Scacchi, Christopher Cazenove and Shashi Kapoor

programme.title: Krisha (2015)
programme.desc: A woman returns for Thanksgiving dinner after a decade away from her family, but past demons threaten to scupper the festivities. Comedy drama, starring Krisha Fairchild and Alex Dobrenko

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Keen to keep out of trouble, Grace and Zara turn down Cindy's offer. Elsewhere, Mason wants to return the act of kindness his sister showed him

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Cindy, Zara and Grace go into panic mode when they realise Cindy's incriminating notepad is missing. Sienna asks Ste for her old job back

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads to Boca Raton in Florida to turn around the fortunes of Italian restaurant Anna Vincenzo's. The owner opened the establishment in 2001 with the help of her father but the business has failed to meet her expectations, and the chef realises that her ruthless style of management is having an adverse influence, not only on her staff but also on her family

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: The chef travels to Newbury Park in southern California to help Mexican restaurant Mama Rita's. The owner previously ran a successful catering company but has struggled to adapt her skills to meet the demands of a new business - and with a year's worth of food stored in the freezer Gordon realises he has a tough job ahead

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: A white Midwesterner and his family adjust to moving into a predominantly black area of California. Pilot episode of the comedy, with Cedric the Entertainer and Max Greenfield

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: Calvin reluctantly agrees to help Dave repair the damage.when a water pipe bursts at the Johnsons' home, while Gemma discovers a surprising secret about Tina

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny and Bernadette go to San Diego for a pharmaceutical sales convention, leaving Howard in charge of the children. When Sheldon finds a book containing science experiments to carry out with children, the guys and Amy make a day of it, using little Michael and Halley as test subjects

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Amy's academic rivals embark on a publicity tour, so the couple try to get the Nobel laureates on their side. Halley's fear of the dark leads to opportunity and conflict for Howard, Bernadette and Stuart

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Claire and Phil swap parenting roles, Gloria falls for a sob story, and Jay helps an overzealous entrepreneur with his dog training scheme. Meanwhile, Mitch finds himself torn between looking after Cam, who is in bed with flu, and attending a Lady Gaga concert. Comedy, directed by The Wonder Years star Fred Savage, featuring Julie Bowen, Ty Burrell and Sofia Vergara

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: The family gathers at Jay's ahead of Alex's graduation and stays longer than intended. Jay tries to conceal a Botox slip-up, Cameron is angered by Mitch's tendency to laugh at his expense and Claire feels emotional about the rate her children are growing up

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Part two of two. When the warden tells Peralta to investigate Romero's drug smuggling operation, Peralta finds himself trapped by divided loyalties. Meanwhile, Santiago is offered a deal by a local mobster who claims he can prove Lt Hawkins is guilty of the crimes that Diaz and Peralta were jailed for, but Holt and the team think they have found a safer plan. Tim Meadows, Lou Diamond Phillips and Gina Gershon guest star

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Now that he's officially back at the precinct and desperate to solve a real criminal case, Peralta finds a loophole to get out of his temporarily designated desk duty. Unfortunately, that loophole rests on his ability to pass an official evaluation performed by Captain Holt. While Boyle provides Peralta with moral support, Jeffords and Santiago help Diaz, who believes Pimento may be cheating on her

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Bernadette receives her PhD, and the friends then tease Howard about being the only one among them who is not a doctor. Meanwhile, Raj becomes Sheldon's new flatmate after overhearing Leonard and Priya engaging in a Star Trek bedroom fantasy. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kunal Nayyar

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny worries about the consequences of spending the night with Raj, and Leonard's reaction confirms her worst fears. Meanwhile, Sheldon is more interested in the upcoming paintball competition, and tries to refocus the boys' attentions as they argue over the previous evening's activities. Comedy, starring Jim Parsons, Johnny Galecki and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard is upset to learn Penny is dating someone, so his friends encourage him to seek a new romance by asking another woman out. Sara Gilbert appears alongside her Rosen co-star Johnny Gale

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is fired for being disrespectful to his boss, and explores new activities in a bid to find a purpose in life other than physics, but Leonard takes drastic action to restore him to his old self. Laurie Metcalf guest stars as Sheldon's mother

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: A former neighbour returns and it appears he is much wealthier than when he left. Jay offers Manny some constructive criticism, and Phil cannot help thinking about what could have been. Thanksgiving edition of the American comedy, starring Ed O'Neill and Julie Bowen

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: While gathered around Jay and Gloria's pool on a sunny December day, it dawns on the clan members that they are not going to be together over the festive period, so they bring the holiday forward by organising an 'express Christmas'. Starring Ed O'Neill and Julie Bowen

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: After mobster Seamus Murphy threatens Kevin, Holt devises an elaborate plan to hide his husband in a safe house, with Peralta as his guard. However as the squad members work overtime to find Seamus and take him down, Kevin and Peralta grow miserable with being cooped up alone together

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Peralta is called upon to negotiate a hostage situation with a jewel thief, only to discover that the culprit is a familiar face. Santiago and Gina help Boyle with the demands of his new food truck business, and Holt panics when a member of the selection committee for the Police Commissioner post decides to interview Hitchcock

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon competes with Wil Wheaton (guest starring as himself) for the role of the new Professor Proton when the scientist's old TV series gets a reboot. Penny looks after Halley when Howard and Bernadette are both put on bed rest

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Bert collaborate on a research project, even though Sheldon is embarrassed to be associated with the study of geology. Penny and Bernadette coach Raj on how to navigate his fledgling relationship with Ruchi. Swati Kapila and Brian Posehn guest star

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Comic-book store owner Stuart asks Amy out on a date, forcing a jealous Sheldon to consider the future of his relationship with her. Meanwhile, the scientists become obsessed with an unusual new card game, and Penny organises a round of Twister. Comedy, starring Jim Parsons and Mayim Bialik

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard confronts the man who tormented him in high school, while Penny realises she did her fair share of bullying in the past and calls the people she targeted to apologise. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Ste and James want to make amends with Sienna and Maxine. Elsewhere, Goldie is tricked into speaking to Mercedes again

programme.title: Married at First Sight Australia
programme.desc: Four weeks after the end of the experiment all the participants are reunited for a final dinner party, with two couples entering united and the others facing hard truths

programme.title: Sam Thompson: Is This ADHD?
programme.desc: The reality star tries to find out if his struggles with inattention, disorganisation and hyperactivity are quirks of his personality, or whether they are isymptoms of attention deficit hyperactivity disorder. As Sam explores the subject more closely, he grapples with whether to seek out a formal diagnosis, meets others who have been in a similar situation, and examines how therapy and medication can impact day-to-day life with ADHD

programme.title: Made in Chelsea
programme.desc: Miles announces that he is off on a sudden trip to Canada, while Imogen reveals to Lily that she has secretly been dating Harvey for weeks

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics share their opinions on shows in April 2017, including Britain's Got Talent, Nature's Weirdest Event, Doctor Who, First Dates, Culinary Genius and the news

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Croydon mates Josh and Jack take part in a double date, but problems arise after they meet Morgan and Jasmine, and both fall for the same girl. Meanwhile, divorced mum-of-two Sandy hopes to find romance with an astrology expert Steve, though incompatible star signs may be a problem. And tomboy boat-builder Abbey returns to the restaurant, but will she find a soul mate in Eddie, an odd job man who's nervous around women?

programme.title: Married at First Sight Australia
programme.desc: Four weeks after the end of the experiment all the participants are reunited for a final dinner party, with two couples entering united and the others facing hard truths

programme.title: Made in Chelsea

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads to Boca Raton in Florida to turn around the fortunes of Italian restaurant Anna Vincenzo's. The owner opened the establishment in 2001 with the help of her father but the business has failed to meet her expectations, and the chef realises that her ruthless style of management is having an adverse influence, not only on her staff but also on her family

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: Tina gets carried away when she tries to help Gemma with her first fundraiser as school principal. Dave aids Calvin in his efforts to win a special auction prize for his mother

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: Calvin reluctantly invites Dave to join his guys' night in, while Gemma and Tina take their first girls' trip to Las Vegas and find themselves unexpectedly in the spotlight

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Cindy, Zara and Grace go into panic mode when they realise Cindy's incriminating notepad is missing. Sienna asks Ste for her old job back

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Ste tries to avoid hurting his best friend Sienna, but he might have no choice if he wants to keep his business afloat. Elsewhere, some damaging papers fall into the wrong hands

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay visits Le Bistro in Lighthouse Point, Florida, where the stubborn chef and owner has lost his passion for cooking. The visiting expert hopes to help, but his criticisms are not well received, causing tempers to flare

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay revisits three restaurants he tried to save - Handlebar, Casa Roma and the Black Pearl - to find out whether his advice has been put to good use

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: Dave gives Calvin a spare key to the Johnsons' house in case of an emergency and is pleasantly surprised when the gesture is reciprocated, or so he thinks

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: Dave and Gemma decide to invite the Butlers to their housewarming party. When everyone but Calvin accepts, Dave decides he has had enough of Calvin's refusal to welcome him to town

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Amy has a meltdown when she feels the pressure of what it would mean for women everywhere if she were to win a Nobel Prize. Raj and Howard attempt to relive the good old days when Howard buys a scooter that looks like the one he had years earller

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Raj is worried that people won't take him seriously in his own field after publishing a paper that suggests he may have discovered alien life. Penny encourages Leonard to stand up for himself when he aims to become the principal investigator on a plasma physics study

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Jay hopes for a quiet afternoon on the lake fishing, but his family has other plans involving fuss and thrills. Claire and Mitchell become trapped in their childhood home, Phil meets his arch-enemy from college at a shopping centre and Cam encounters a sticky situation at the bakery. Meanwhile, the children face the task of creatively editing their grandfather's birthday video

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: The calamity-prone group visits a guest ranch where Mitch and Cam hope to rediscover their macho side, and a cowboy named Hank takes an instant shine to Gloria. Comedy, starring Ed O'Neill and Julie Bowen

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: The precinct embarks on its fifth annual Halloween Heist and, as usual, everybody has a plan and no one is safe. Relationships and friendships are tested in the competition to win a spectacular championship belt and the title 'Amazing Human Slash Genius' by midnight, leaving all the members of the squad pitted against one another

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: To track down an infamous arms dealer, Peralta and Jeffords go undercover at an illegal gambling club, but when Captain Holt tries to coach them in the art of poker, his addiction resurfaces. Boyle buys a food truck that was formerly the site of a brutal double murder, to the horror of his only investor in the project, Santiago. Hitchcock and Scully have an unusual challenge for Dia. Cop comedy, starring Andy Samberg

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Amy is caught in a battle of wills between Sheldon and Penny, while Leonard tries to reignite his long-distance relationship with Priya, who has moved back to India. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Kaley Cuoco and Jim Parsons

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard inadvertently gives the impression he is attracted to Amy when he accompanies her to a colleague's wedding. Meanwhile, Howard tries to persuade Bernadette they should live with his mother after getting married and suggests a trial run of the arrangement over the weekend

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard fears he is wasting his time with Penny and ends up spending the night with fellow scientist Leslie. However, he is disappointed when she later tells him she was only interested in a one-night stand. Meanwhile, Sheldon frets over a change to his hamburger routine. Starring Johnny Galecki, Kaley Cuoco and Jim Parsons

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny hosts a Halloween costume party, which proves a worthy test for the boys' social skills. During the event, Leonard has a run-in with Penny's ex-boyfriend. Kaley Cuoco, Johnny Galecki and Simon Helberg star

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Phil fears the worst when he misses a call informing him of the results of a routine medical, while Manny's day out with Jay is going well until he is whisked away for a belated birthday treat at the horse races. American comedy, starring Ty Burrell and Ed O'Neill

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Jay and Claire help Manny and Luke with a school project - building capsules that would best protect an egg in a two-storey drop. Meanwhile, Phil enlists the help of Haley and Gloria as he prepares for a major real-estate presentation, while Mitch and Cameron use the power of song to impress prospective birth mothers. American comedy, starring Julie Bowen and Ed O'Neill

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Peralta prepares for an all-night interrogation in the hope of securing a confession from a stubborn suspect. However, when Captain Holt sacrifices an evening at the opera to stay behind at the precinct and help, the two officers clash over how to make the man talk. Cop comedy, starring Andy Samberg and Andre Braugher

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Peralta and Santiago investigate a string of arson attacks that are connected to Santiago's favourite crossword puzzle author. Gina helps Holt improve his Commissioner candidate presentation, while Jeffords, Diaz, Hitchcock and Scully argue over who deserves to get a new detective car

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard and Howard are furious when they learn that Sheldon went to work with the military behind their backs. Angered, the pair ask Kripke to help them get their own back on Sheldon, much to his annoyance. Meanwhile, Bernadette suspects that Ruchi might be trying to steal her job while she is on bed rest, so she asks Raj to investigate for her, putting him in a very awkward position. Dean Norris guest stars

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The guys find a laptop that has some virtual currency on it. The only snag is, the computer belongs to Penny's ex-boyfriend Zack. Meanwhile, a seven-year-old video reveals a secret about Leonard and Penny's relationship

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is uninterested in Amy's career, so Penny, Raj and Leonard try to make him understand that sometimes it benefits a relationship to pretend to care about a partner's achievements. Howard notices Bernadette is uncomfortable around children when she helps him perform a magic show at his nephew's birthday party

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard asks Penny out on a date, and they agree to give their relationship another chance. They soon remember why it did not work out in the first place, but end up sleeping together anyway. The 100th episode of the comedy, starring Johnny Galecki and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: The villagers head to Chester races, where Sienna has her eyes on the prize, but it is the McQueens who are convinced their money troubles could be coming to an end

programme.title: Married at First Sight Australia
programme.desc: Meeting up for the final time, the group share their honest thoughts on some of the biggest talking points from the experiment

programme.title: Celebrity Gogglebox
programme.desc: Famous faces including Nick Grimshaw, Rylan, Roman Kemp, Clare Balding, Gyles Brandreth, Carol Vorderman, Emma and Matt Willis, Andi Oliver, Oti Mabuse, Bill Bailey, Rob Beckett, Tom Allen, Fearne Cotton and Gok Wan review shows from July 2022, including Stranger Things, Love Island, Paul Hollywood Eats Mexico, How to Build a Sex Room, Long Lost Family, Countdown and BBC News coverage of Boris Johnson's resignation as PM

programme.title: The Inbetweeners
programme.desc: At the start of the new term, Carli organises a fashion show that Simon is eager to participate in. Will tries to shake off his embarrassing reputation, while Jay continues to lie about his sexual experiences. Comedy, starring Emily Head, Joe Thomas, Simon Bird, James Buckley and Blake Harrison

programme.title: The Inbetweeners

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Michael Butcher and Phil Palmer want to bring a touch of urban glamour to their new home at Christmas Farm near Newbury, Berkshire, by creating a modern farmhouse that combines an open-plan party pad with functional spaces below. As the builders set to work on the handcrafted flint exterior, complete with a vast trapezoid window, the pair juggle construction with farming the land, and in an attempt to make the project work financially, they set up a microbrewery in the barn. Kevin McCloud follows their progress

programme.title: Matt Baker's Travels in the Country: USA
programme.desc: Matt gets a rare up-close encounter with some gigantic elephant seals on California's Pacific coast and meets a flower farmer in the hills of Rainbow who has managed to perfect growing beautiful blooms on the steep slopes. Up in Pioneertown, the presenter meets the residents of a real life wild-west town that was originally created for the movies before hiking out in the Santa Rosa mountains. Finally, he stops in Santa Cruz to find out why the coast became the birthplace of surfing in mainland USA

programme.title: Caught on Camera
programme.desc: Cameras reveal what can go wrong when a dream holiday turns into a nightmare. Footage includes sunbed dashes, ski crashes, Brits behaving badly and locals behaving madly, all told by the people who were there. Psychologists and industry experts also reflect on the anxieties and situations that many can experience during a break

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: A 72-year-old is airlifted to St George's after being trampled by a herd of cows while walking her dog, and 13-year-old Tamzen has broken her leg at school trampoline practice. Meanwhile, 18-year-old art student Hermione has cut her hand on a glass at her part-time waitressing job

programme.title: Border Force: America's Gatekeepers
programme.desc: More than 100 boxes full of drugs are discovered inside an unlikely vehicle at the World Trade Bridge. In Progreso, a suspected gang member attempts to cross into the United States

programme.title: The Force: Behind the Line
programme.desc: Fly-on-the-wall documentary series. Police in New South Wales have their eye on three cannabis growers, and Western Australia officers use canine assistance to nail a drug-addled criminal.

programme.title: The Force: Behind the Line
programme.desc: Fly-on-the-wall documentary series set in Australia. Police in New South Wales set up a sting operation to arrest a man who is dealing in a dangerous hallucinogenic drug called nexis.

programme.title: Storage Hunters UK
programme.desc: Nat and John think they have found a bargain when the team visits Barking in east London, while two former rivals team up when a vintage vehicle sparks a bidding war

programme.title: Storage Hunters UK
programme.desc: The gang is on Barry and Darren's home turf in Reading, Berkshire, where the pair are determined not to leave empty-handed. Meanwhile, Dan takes a gamble

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, James May and Richard Hammond compete in a land race from Resolute, Canada, to the North Pole in their most ambitious challenge to date. Pitting horse power against dog power they travel 450 miles across mountainous land masses and jagged sea ice at temperatures as low as minus 65C

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, James May and Richard Hammond travel to Africa, where they are challenged to buy a second-hand car costing less than £1,500 and in no way designed to go off-road, and drive across Botswana. Along the way they must negotiate salt pans, rivers and reserves full of animals while facing sweltering heat and suffocating dust

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Chris Harris, Paddy McGuiness and Freddie Flintoff aren't choosing their own cars, but instead choosing for one another. After unwrapping their presents in the Welsh village of Bethlehem, the trio set off on a yuletide trek across Britain, stopping off to play the game of 'High-Speed Visual Charades' and deliver an enormous tree to the Unesco World Heritage city of Bath. Then it's time for the presenters to visit the Top Gear test track, transformed into a winter wonderland of speed

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: The three motoring enthusiasts head to Spain on a mission to help its struggling economy - but the convertible supercars they take are very expensive and anything but discreet. With Jeremy Clarkson in a McLaren MP4-12C, Richard Hammond driving a Ferrari 458 and James May behind the wheel of an Audi R8 V10, the trio encounter mountain passes, empty towns and an abandoned airport before creating their own street circuit in a deserted Madrid development. Plus, Sherlock star Benedict Cumberbatch sets a lap time in the Reasonably Priced Car

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson drives the Jaguar F-Type sports car on some of Britain's finest roads, while Richard Hammond jumps inside the Range Rover Sport and gives it a thorough workout off-road, on a track and in what he believes is its most natural habitat - the lanes of Cheshire. James May goes for a countryside adventure in the New Routemaster London bus brought into use in 2013, which is propelled by a turbodiesel generator and a powerful electric motor. Inspired by the machines they have tested, the trio then meet to celebrate Britain's motor industry with a grand finale in front of Buckingham Palace. Plus, former Formula One driver Mark Webber takes to the track for a lap in the Reasonably Priced Car

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: AJ Odudu and Will Best present coverage as the Red Bull Soapbox Race returns for its 10th anniversary at London's Alexandra Palace with 70 teams from across the UK

programme.title: Mortimer & Whitehouse: Gone Fishing
programme.desc: Cameras follow old friends Paul Whitehouse and Bob Mortimer as they continue on their angling trip round the UK. This time, Paul and Bob fish the river Wensum in Norfolk for Roach, but as the pair struggle up and down the riverbanks, they begin to realise how age is starting to take its toll on their physicality. After staying overnight in a disused train station and visiting a local pub, the pair decide to challenge each other to a fishing competition the following day, where the winner gets a very special culinary treat

programme.title: Mortimer & Whitehouse: Gone Fishing
programme.desc: The pair fish at Christchurch's Bridge Pool in Dorset, hoping to catch sea trout, before Paul persuades Bob to charter a boat in search of sea bass. They venture out to the Needles where Paul makes a incredible catch, and decide to take the fish to a local restaurant to prepare it

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo starts his latest tour as Hampton Court Palace, where he is treated to a private tour of the Great Vine - the world's longest grapevine - before moving on to stately Claremont House, where tragic circumstances led directly to the birth of the Victorian era. He then moves up the line to Wimbledon and the site of a historic duelling event before ending his journey in Teddington, where he hears the story of a reformer whose work revolutionised the care for those with living disabilities

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo begins the final leg in Egham, Surrey, where a historic steam fair offers the original 'white-knuckle' ride. Across town lies the Royal Holloway College, now part of the University of London, where the ex-politician discovers the institution's philanthropic roots. Moving into Berkshire, Portillo drops in at a factory manufacturing a famous sleep-inducing beverage with historic roots. Michael's journey ends at Henley-on-Thames in Oxfordshire, where he learns that rowing in an eight is a challenging business

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo sets off from Ayr as he embarks on the first leg of a journey through southern Scotland from west to east, admiring the granite island of Ailsa Craig in the Firth of Clyde before getting to grips with the sport of curling, with a little help from a Scottish world champion. The Ancient Society of Kilwinning Archers invites Michael to take part in a competition, at Barassie he rides the footplate of a freight train hauling coal on Scotland's oldest railway line as he heads on towards Stewarton

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo continues his journey through southern Scotland, with this leg beginning in the industrial town of Greenock, from where he sets sail in the world's last sea-going paddle steamer. He then sees the devastating effects of a fire at the Glasgow School of Art, heads to Blantyre to find out about the humble beginnings of a famous missionary and explorer and learns to make sourdough in a bakery in Strathaven before finishing his trip in Larkhall

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo starts his latest tour as Hampton Court Palace, where he is treated to a private tour of the Great Vine - the world's longest grapevine - before moving on to stately Claremont House, where tragic circumstances led directly to the birth of the Victorian era. programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys

Moving into Berkshire, Portillo drops in at a factory manufacturing a famous sleep-inducing beverage with historic roots. programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: The trio of motoring enthusiasts embark on another epic road trip, this time across western America in front-engined supercars. Jeremy Clarkson pilots the Lexus LFA, which has a spectacularly high-revving V10 powerplant, Richard Hammond gets behind the wheel of the muscular Dodge Viper, and James May opts for the latest incarnation of Aston Martin's Vanquish. On their journey from Las Vegas to Palm Springs via Los Angeles, the presenters tackle racing circuits and find themselves in a race against the police, before rushing to the Mexican border - and there's a terrifying penalty for the last man to arrive. programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May embark on a race from London's Wembley Stadium to Milan's San Siro, the home of Italian football giants AC and Inter. A price restriction leads Jeremy to grab the keys to a Shelby Mustang GT500, which costs the equivalent of £35,000 in America and packs a supercharged punch of more than 650bhp. James and Richard pin their hopes on the pan-European rail network in a bid to secure the prize of tickets to a top-flight football match, with nothing but a long journey home awaiting the losers. On the test track, Jeremy puts Toyota's GT86 coupe through its paces, and its promise of entertaining rear-wheel-drive handling should put a smile on his face. programme.desc: Laura Hamilton helps Surinder Bedi and her son Narinder find a holiday home for the whole family in the Murcia region on Spain's Mediterranean coast. programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Angela Keenan and Jon Benbow-Brown have visited Menorca five times together, and have fallen in love with the laid-back way of life on the island. The pair are planning to retire there full-time, so Ben Hillman shows them five houses on the island for their budget of £165,000

programme.desc: On the Costa Blanca, married estate agents Sophie and Damon help Perthshire pair Betty and Gordon find the Alicante holiday home they have long wished for. Estate agent Kerry is challenged with fulfilling their long wish list, but things become more difficult when a potential property surprises the seasoned agent

programme.title: Help! We Bought a Village
programme.desc: Anneli, the manager of a restored medieval village in France, is having a tricky time setting up the last wedding party of the season. Elsewhere, the owners of a French hamlet celebrate their first restored building. Finally, passionate estate agent Mark spends his life hunting derelict villages in Galicia

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: In the Lake District, Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien meet Tamara, whose family have been farming there for nearly a century. Simon has ambitious plans to turn a pile of old slate into an unusual lamp, while Henry sets his heart on upcycling the seat from an old pony and trap

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: On the first night in Kent, 51-year-old construction site manager and part-time bouncer Mark hopes that his dinner party can be as much about the party as it is about the dinner, as he hosts a cheesy fun-fuelled evening. Will party poppers, balloons, confetti cannons and surprising celebrity stories impress 53-year-old dog-lover Karen, 39-year-old Czech shop assistant Verush, 42-year-old singer Amrick and 58-year-old fashion photographer Anthony?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: On the second night in Kent, competitive sales assistant Verush is going all out to win by hosting a Czech-themed evening, but ex-stripper Mark isn't impressed, comparing Verush's pasta to MDF and pastry to leather, while the first night's argument between dog lover Karen and photographer Anthony is reignited

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Dog enthusiast Karen hosts the third night of a week of dinner parties in Kent, hoping to impress her guests by serving up a menu inspired by her four-legged friends. After the cheesy fun of the previous night, she is determined to impress her guests

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Amrick takes his turn to host in Kent, hoping to wow his guests by revealing his musical talents and with his traditional Indian cuisine. But with dog-lover Karen and competitive Verush not liking hot and spicy food, there could be trouble - while photographer Anthony questions ex-stripper Mark's dress sense

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Photographer Anthony attempts to wow his guests with an evening of fine food and culinary excellence on the final day of the competition in Kent. However, the soiree is jeopardised by ex-stripper Mark on overdrive and dog-lover Karen showcasing some incredible impressions from animals to Anthony himself. The host might be cockily confident he can win, but Karen seemingly remains in pole position to bag the £1,000 prize

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Leah Charles-King helps a semi-retired lawyer and a retired firefighter to make a permanent move together to the mountain villages of Málaga Province in southern Spain

programme.title: The Dog House
programme.desc: Nervous young labrador Loki arrives at the centre, and soon meets seasoned dog owner Sharron, a Royal Navy nurse. But will a recent injury prevent her from taking him in? Small terrier Midnight is also looking for a forever home, although when he is introduced to a couple dealing with the pain of not being able to have children, he only has eyes for one of them

programme.title: 999: On the Front Line
programme.desc: Paramedics tend to a young mum having a panic attack while out with her son. Cameras also focus on a two-year-old who is running a high temperature

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics share their opinions on what they have been watching during the week, with cameras capturing their instant reactions and the lively discussions that are prompted by the week's biggest and best shows

programme.title: Gogglebox

programme.title: Andrew: The Problem Prince
programme.desc: The second of two programmes telling the inside story of Prince Andrew's 2019 Newsnight interview with Emily Maitlis and the subsequent chain of events that led to a royal disaster. In the 1980s, Andrew was a Falklands war hero and a national heart-throb, glory years that culminated in his marriage to Sarah Ferguson. But following his departure from the Navy, his image took a turn as his new role as trade envoy proved unsuccessful - and his need to fund a lavish lifestyle and friendship with Jeffrey Epstein eventually prompted the interview that cemented his downfall

programme.title: Prince Andrew: The Musical
programme.desc: All-singing, all-dancing satirical biopic charting the rise and fall of the Duke of York. With seven hilarious original musical numbers and revealing archive footage, the Duke of York's downfall gets a West End-style treatment, as Andrew goes from '80s war hero to present-day royal outcast amid damaging allegations and an ill-advised Newsnight interview. Written by and starring Kieran Hodgson, with Emma Sidi, Munya Chawawa and Harry Enfield

programme.title: The Windsors
programme.desc: Comedy soap opera from the writers of Star Stories that imagines the royal family as they have never been seen before

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown
programme.desc: Jimmy Carr hosts the game show mash-up, with Rachel Riley and Susie Dent. Jon Richardson and Sara Pascoe take on Sean Lock and Richard Ayoade. Nick Helm joins Susie in Dictionary Corner

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Married couple Abbie and Charlie join host Anna Richardson and feature as the first picker pair as they search for another woman to join their relationship. Plus 41 year-old actor and glamour puss Chrissie from Leeds is hoping to find husband number four

programme.title: The Secret Life of the Zoo
programme.desc: Chester's 18 chimpanzees face upheaval when new female chimp Vila arrives from a zoo in Germany. Meanwhile, nine-year-old cheetah mum Kinky Tail is vomiting after meals, and her three-year-old daughter Safi must watch and wait as her mum is taken to the zoo's medical centre. Cameras also follow Asian short-clawed otter Annie, who recently gave birth to a large litter of five pups

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Butcher Graeme Curley hosts the second night in Glasgow, where he has planned a meaty menu complete with pork ribs. He hopes to wow his guests by serving steak - and by bringing some of his trade to the dinner table

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In Belfast, three couples compete to host the best dinner party. Sarah and Paddy kick things off with a fine-dining feast for guests Louise and Danny and Emma and Samson. The hosts mix Eastern and traditional fare. Then, on night two Emma and Samson treat their guests to some Mozambican delights. After a first course that whistles and wows, palates need to be cleansed for the main course, but a chilly chat about ice-cream leaves Louise red in the face. On the final night, Louise and Danny confound everyone's expectations with a sailing-based starter. A spot of model behaviour excites the guests, and a mountain of meringue impresses, but is it enough to win the £1,000 prize?

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Jasmine Harman helps Chris and Dan Boettcher from Bedfordshire find a holiday home in the Axarquia region of Spain's Costa del Sol on their budget of £70,000. They view five properties, hoping one of them will be the retreat they can escape to with their family without too much prior planning

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Engaged couple Kay Havard and Paul Young wish to buy a holiday home for romantic weekends away and to share with family and friends. Scarlette Douglas does her best to impress them with five properties on Spain's Costa Blanca for their budget of £80,000

programme.title: Sun, Sea and Selling Houses
programme.desc: In Almería, husband-and-wife team Steve and Sharon Garner help teaching duo Amanda and Paul find their perfect Spanish property, where they can enjoy their retirement. In the province of Alicante, darts enthusiast David and his wife Jane are hoping to hit the bullseye with a holiday home located close to bars and restaurants. On hand to help the duo find their dream property are sisters Sophie and Charlotte

programme.title: Help! We Bought a Village

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It

programme.title: Come Dine with Me

programme.title: Come Dine with Me

However, with fellow contestant Peggy born in the United States, the host may have her work cut out in presenting the perfect dish

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Outsourcing manager Steve hosts the third night in Lancashire, where the 51-year-old plans to wow his guests with a 'man of the world' menu that relies heavily on strong Indian spices. Peggy picks him up on his shop-bought black pudding, while Nicky is unimpressed by the mildness of the chicken balti, resulting in a humiliating chilli-sauce challenge

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: American Peggy hosts a USA-themed dinner party on the fourth night of the competition in Lancashire, and hopes her Arizonan recipes will be enough to win her the £1,000 prize. Her menu comprises tried and tested dishes, including her dessert of peach dump cake. However, friction between her and fellow contestant Steve continues to build

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: It is the final dinner party in Lancashire, and the turn of sales manager Andy to host. He is confident in his locally sourced gastro menu and delivers a meal with plenty of flair, but faces the challenge of impressing foodie Nicky. He is also under pressure to convince American Peggy of the merits of the region's food, while his fellow Lancastrians Valerie and Steve are keen to see how the area has influenced his cooking

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Ben Hillman helps Emma and Shane from Cornwall find their dream holiday home in Madeira on a budget of £200,000

programme.title: Sarah Beeny's New Life in the Country

But once it's up, they find out that it doesn't fit onto the timber housing. Sarah and Laurie also make a unique family flag and Graham personalises the weathervane

programme.title: Andrew: The Problem Prince
programme.desc: The second of two programmes telling the inside story of Prince Andrew's 2019 Newsnight interview with Emily Maitlis and the subsequent chain of events that led to a royal disaster. In the 1980s, Andrew was a Falklands war hero and a national heart-throb, glory years that culminated in his marriage to Sarah Ferguson. But following his departure from the Navy, his image took a turn as his new role as trade envoy proved unsuccessful - and his need to fund a lavish lifestyle and friendship with Jeffrey Epstein eventually prompted the interview that cemented his downfall

programme.title: Con Air (1997)
programme.desc: Honourably discharged Army Ranger sergeant Cameron Poe hitches a ride home on a maximum-security flight conveying some of America's deadliest criminals. When they hijack the plane in mid-flight, led by criminal mastermind Cyrus the Virus, Poe is forced to intervene. Meanwhile, US marshal Vince Larkin has an ongoing battle on the ground to prevent the plane from being blown to pieces. Director Simon West's blockbusting action thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, John Cusack, John Malkovich, Steve Buscemi, Ving Rhames and Colm Meaney

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: A 76-year-old man sustains a head injury after falling down some stairs, and his daughter reflects on how his caring for her mother through her dementia has left him exhausted. programme.title: 999: On the Front Line

programme.title: First Dates

programme.title: Celebrity Hunted

Nik and Eva continue to taunt the hunters with a postcard from the Welsh coast but their route to the extraction point is nerve-wracking. Hunter HQ use every trick they have in the final push to catch the celebrities before they are extracted and tensions rise with close calls, a motorway pursuit and a desperate foot race as the competition comes to an adrenaline-fuelled end

programme.title: Guy Martin's Best Bits
programme.desc: The presenter looks back at times when he helped to build and pilot amazing machines to world speed records, and tells the fascinating stories behind the record attempts

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Hairdresser Michelle Blackett is the host on day three in Glasgow, and hopes to impress the diners by preparing a menu of exceedingly well-appointed food. Over the course of the evening, Michelle's guests discover her hidden heritage, and hospitality student Erwin - who speaks five languages - does his best to add the 'Glaswegian' dialect to his arsenal

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Couples try to outdo one another by throwing the perfect dinner party in Co Antrim. Newlyweds Rebecca and Gareth kick things off, attempting to add some spice to proceedings with a Mexican fiesta. Next to host are care workers Nel and Billy, who rustle up a Filipino menu. Finishing off the week are smallholders Mandy and Jim, who serve up a Filipino roast pig dish followed by baked Alaska

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Recently divorced Patricia Malty from Devon wants to make a fresh start on the Costa Calida in Spain after selling her home and moving in with her best friend, with Laura Hamilton helping her find suitable properties for her £90,000 budget

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Lynne and Peter Evans have spent the last 15 years living on a Greek island and, now they're based back in the UK, are hankering after a second home in the sun. Fuerteventura has held a special place in their hearts ever since they first went there on holiday with their two children so they think it's the perfect place to buy. Ben Hillman needs all of his property know-how to show them five options for their £80,000 budget

programme.title: Sun, Sea and Selling Houses
programme.desc: In Almería, mother-and-son team Sharon and Shaun Garner catch up with Phil and Jeanette who were buying their first ever home together two years ago to see the fruits of their labour. In Alicante, father-and-daughter duo Manuel and Sophie Rodriguez also visit ex-clients, getting a progress report from Sue and Richard, who were looking for a holiday home for their budget of 130,000 euros

programme.title: Help! We Bought a Village
programme.desc: A family from Manchester transform a hamlet in France. Meanwhile, a young couple fall in love with an earthquake-damaged Italian borgo, and a couple of B&B owners in the Pyrenees buy a ramshackle holiday village built by the Catholic church in the 1930s

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien head to Pembrokeshire to meet a cattle breeder whose barns include a pair of discarded horns, and a camper van fan with a vintage pedal car

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Nursing manager Sarah hosts the first of a week of dinner parties in Leeds, taking inspiration from her husband's Middle Eastern heritage to offer her guests a Turkish fusion menu. Joining her is 28-year-old painter decorator Alex, 45-year-old bridal shop owner Abbi, 60-year-old community centre manager Janet and 56-year-old record label boss Phil. A hilarious evening lies in store, with unexpected tattoos, beauty tips and twerking

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Would-be clairvoyant Janet hosts the second of a week of dinner parties in Leeds and hopes her ghoul-themed dinner party will help her win the cash prize. Part of Janet's plan is to pretend her house is haunted and she has a practical joke lined up for nursing manager Sarah and bridal shop owner Abbi to find. With more surprises in store, will the fright-night theme be enough to ghost Janet into the lead?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Record label owner Phil hosts the third night of a week of dinner parties in Leeds, hoping to win the £1,000 prize money by serving up a 1970s rock-themed menu. His guests are astounded by his mystery past, and painter and decorator Alex is unimpressed when wedding shop owner Abbi continues to wind him up

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Painter and decorator Alex hosts the fourth night in Leeds, hoping to win the prize money by serving up a cruise-themed menu from around the world - which impresses jealous rival Janet so much, she almost turns violent. Abbi continues to belittle the host - until he reveals he spends his evenings on stage impersonating a famous heart-throb singer. Will his performance bag him the top prize?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Bridal shop owner Abbi hopes to woo her guests with a wedding-themed party on the final day of the competition in Leeds. All week Abbi and Michael Buble impersonator Alex have had a bit of a banter that has sailed close to the wind. Will the tension take over, or can the wedding theme create an amorous atmosphere that will help Abbi win the £1,000 prize?

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Jason and Lindsay Crossland from East Yorkshire met 28 years ago when they were working for the RAF. Lindsay suffers from osteoarthritis, which affects her mobility, and as warm sunshine helps her condition their dream is to spend every school holiday in Florida with their son before eventually retiring there. They have a budget of up to £180,000, but will Ben Hillman be able to find them what they're looking for?

programme.title: Billionaire Blooms
programme.desc: Jamie's in Venice with a limitless budget and complete creative freedom, fashioning two stunning set-ups for the wedding of one of his most treasured clients. He has assembled a squad of talented florists to help him as he transforms an ancient palazzo and a world-famous hotel. On the outskirts of Edinburgh, Ian and his team of florists attempt their biggest ever floral arch. It's just the starting point of an epic installation within a stunning castle. With so many weddings scheduled for the summer, time is the biggest pressure so there's not a moment to waste

programme.title: The Great Celebrity Bake Off for Stand Up to Cancer
programme.desc: Singer Ellie Goulding, comedian Mawaan Rizwan, TV presenter and disability advocate Sophie Morgan and actress Tracy-Ann Oberman take part in the charity baking show. Under the watchful eye of judges Paul Hollywood and Prue Leith they tackle marble cake and jam roly-poly, before making a showstopping biscuit in honour of their celebrity hero. Presented by Noel Fielding and Matt Lucas

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics share their opinions on what they have been watching during the week, with cameras capturing their instant reactions and the lively discussions that are prompted by the week's biggest and best shows

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The opinionated TV viewers pass judgement on the best and worst shows of December 2013, including Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone, A Great British Christmas with Sarah Beeny and I'm a Celebrity, Get Me Out of Here!

programme.title: Taskmaster
programme.desc: Contenders Frankie Boyle, Ivo Graham, Jenny Eclair, Kiell Smith-Bynoe and Mae Martin continue to address the challenges set for them. Greg Davies has some tricky judging to do when people question the definition of the colour gold and nobody understands a simple egg-shelling task. As usual, Alex Horne offers sterling support to all concerned

programme.title: The Kidnap of Angel Lynn
programme.desc: Using exclusive interviews, social media and immersive graphics, this documentary tells the story of the abusive relationship that led to the life-altering abduction of Angel Lynn. At just 18 years-old, Angel met her boyfriend through a mutual friend and he rapidly became abusive towards her, isolating her and ultimately abducting her. After being forced into a van, Angel fell from the back of the speeding vehicle and was left on the side of the road with near-fatal injuries that left her unable to walk, speak or feed herself. Her story is retold as she learns to live again

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Anna Richardson is joined by 25 year-old Lauren, a movie buff and professional online gamer from Camberley who is looking for a geeky gamer to be her perfect player two so she can reboot her love life after three years of being single. Ryan who is 28 and from Cheltenham, is looking for his Mr Right. As a sucker for a silver fox and a dad bod, can he find his dream guy to wake up to every morning?

programme.title: The Greatest Auction
programme.desc: AJ Odudu hosts as millionaires, private collectors and antique dealers compete to buy extraordinary items. Banksy experts take a risk on a piece of wall featuring work attributed to the anonymous artist and Tommy Cooper's iconic fez goes on sale. Plus, a jar of pickled pig foetuses and an array of Buzzcocks memorabilia

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Sonya, a 77-year-old tour guide who has been widowed for 15 years, is looking for a man to share experiences with, and is set up on a date with 69-year-old film rigger Graham. Meanwhile, 26-year-old florist Charlotte meets 29-year-old data analyst Adam from Blackpool, and former dancer and extrovert Patrick goes on a date with laid-back graphic designer Seph

programme.title: Kirstie and Phil's Love It or List It: Brilliant Builds
programme.desc: Stoke couple Julie and Allen cannot agree on any of the houses they have viewed together, but they are also at a loss as to how they can make their current three-bedroom abode any better. programme.title: The Body in the Bag
programme.desc: The case of Gareth Williams, a GCHQ employee on secondment to MI6, who was found dead inside a padlocked duffel bag in the bath of his London flat in 2010. The case has become one of the biggest unsolved mysteries in recent British history, and even now, 12 years after Williams' death, the public are still waiting for answers as to what happened to the 31-year-old codebreaker. Through interviews with former detectives, forensic investigators, MPs and people who knew Gareth, along with archive footage and reconstruction, this documentary re-examines the case in a bid to get to the bottom of the events that lead to Williams' untimely death - asking did he act alone or were other forces involved?

programme.desc: The team works with Abigail Borin of the Coast Guard Investigative Service after a highly suspicious explosion and fire on board an oil rig kills a US marine corps reservist. Abby detects malware in the platform's computer systems, while Ducky finds traces on the victim's body that lead to a lawyer who works for the oil company. Back in the office, a prankster is bringing some light relief and although the likeliest suspect is Tony, he denies any involvement. Crime drama, guest starring Diane Neal

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs is forced to take a step back from work when his increasingly frail father Jackson begs him to help track down an old friend from the Second World War who does not have long left to live. Meanwhile, the rest of the team investigate the death of a marine sergeant who appears to have been caught in the crossfire during a bungled robbery, but Tony and Tim find evidence the victim may have been targeted. Crime drama, guest starring Ralph Waite (The Waltons), with Mark Harmon

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Petty officer Jody Ray is killed by a hit-and-run driver and evidence points to staff sergeant Justin Dunne, whose guilt seems certain when DiNozzo and McGee find him washing a bloodstained knife when they go to arrest him. However, Dunne tells his lawyer Carrie Clark he was miles away in Falls Church at the time - stabbing bookmaker Donny Sullivan to death. Unable to reveal the truth to the NCIS team, Clark decides to check out the alibi herself. Crime drama, guest starring Salli Richardson-Whitfield (A Town Called Eureka)

programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis examine the murder of a popular Harlem community leader, while McCoy and Carmichael struggle to prevent a chaotic situation. Police drama, starring Sam Waterston, Jerry Orbach and Steven Hill

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis join forces with their Baltimore colleagues to investigate the murder of a government official. It soon emerges that the deceased had been stalked by a man because of her lesbian affair with a married woman, who pleads for her identity to be kept secret. However, an over-zealous attorney embarks on a crusade to make the information public knowledge, going so far as to take the officers to court in an effort to force them to reveal their source - but his interest in the case raises suspicions

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The detectives are presented with a host of suspects while investigating the murder of a teenage drug user - and begin to suspect a member of her wealthy family could be responsible. Drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Steven Hill

programme.desc: The conviction of a death row prisoner is called into question by the revelation that attorney-client privilege may have prompted a former prosecutor to withhold evidence capable of establishing his innocence. Drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Steven Hill

programme.desc: Briscoe and Green grow frustrated with their fruitless investigation of an elderly woman's murder and come to blows over suggestions that one of them is too old for the case. Crime drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Jesse L Martin

programme.desc: The team investigates the disappearance of photographer Martin Roe, who was due to testify at an army first lieutenant's court-martial after he captured a picture of what appeared to be a soldier killing an unarmed civilian. However, the photograph is leaked, and Roe is later found dead with a needle in his arm

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Director Vance charges DiNozzo with a special assignment to go to France, locate Admiral Kendall's wayward daughter Amanda and bring her home. Arriving in Marseille, Tony immediately heads to the local NCIS office, only to find five dead agents. After eventually tracking down Amanda, the pair embark on a rollercoaster ride to the relative safety of the nearest NCIS office in Spain. Michael Weatherly stars

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs travels to his home town after hearing news of his father's death, while the team investigates whether a fire on a US Navy ship was accidental or planned. The vessel served as prison to several members of the Brotherhood of Doubt terrorist group, whom Gibbs was responsible for catching. After the blaze, two of those members are missing. Tony argues that Gibbs would want to know, but Vance does not want him disturbed at this difficult time. Mark Harmon stars

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team arrive on a civilian research vessel in the North Atlantic that has picked up a few wounded officers, but are forced to hide after discovering terrorists are on board

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The team investigates the murder of a teenage girl named AJ when a photograph of the crime scene is leaked on the internet. Stabler and Benson find a potential witness, but there is a problem - he is a 16-year-old heroin addict. Crime drama, starring Christopher Meloni and Mariska Hargitay

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A man accused of sexual assault is adamant that he contacted the woman on a fantasy rape website.
